basics.name: Ricko Yogga
basics.label: Python Developer
basics.summary: I have been doing Python for 3 years. I am enthusiastic Python developer that enjoy writing Pythonic code Throughout the years I have skilled lots of Python Technologies, such as Django and Flask I have been working with several clients in the past, and they love my work! So I will be a valuable assets to your company I am fluent in English both spoken and writing. Let me hear what you have in mind for me to develop for your next killer app!

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability

Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
